text: Kramgoa låtar 1997 is a 1997 Vikingarna studio album, released as CDInformation at Svensk mediedatabas and cassette tape.Information at Svensk mediedatabas The album's major hit song, "Du gav mej ljusa minnen", charted at Svensktoppen for five weeks. The album sold platinum in Sweden, gold in Norway, and totally 160 000 copies throughout the Nordic region.Finnfalla ==Track listing== #Små nära ting #Samma tid samma plats #Du gav mej ljusa minnen #Good Luck Charm #Var det någnting som jag sa #Min barndomstid #I en roddbåt till Kina (On a slow boat to China) #I en roddbåt till Kina #Sån't rår inte åren på #Jag vill ha dej mer #En enkel sång om kärlek #Ingenting #Inga stora bevingade ord #Adios amigo ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (1997–1998) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} == References == Category:1997 albums Category:Vikingarna (band) albums Category:Swedish-language albums
title: Kramgoa låtar 1997
